title: Lucid Is Subpoenaed by SEC Related to SPAC Deal, Shares Fall
sub_head: Electric-vehicle company says regulators are requesting certain documents in a probe that appears to concern projections and statements
body:
Lucid Group Inc. said it received a subpoena from the Securities and Exchange Commission related to the deal that took the electric vehicle company public this summer.
The company said in a regulatory filing Monday that the SEC is requesting certain documents and that the investigation appears to concern certain projections and statements. Lucid said it is fully cooperating with the agency.
